snippet: Mr. Khanna was a romantic leading man and superstar in Indian cinema in the period preceding the rise of the action hero in the 1970s.
abstract: Rajesh Khanna, Bollywood superstar, dies at age 69.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Khanna was a romantic leading man and superstar in Indian cinema in the period preceding the rise of the action hero in the 1970s.

headline.seo: Rajesh Khanna, Bollywood Leading Man, Dies at 69
headline.main: Rajesh Khanna, a Star of ’60s and ’70s Bollywood, Dies at 69
headline.print_headline: Rajesh Khanna, 69, a Star Of ’60s and ’70s Bollywood
